name: nuclia-sync-agent-app
description: This is a Nuclia Sync Agent App

scripts.start: npm run copy-server-to-electron && cd electron-app && npm run start
scripts.make: npm run copy-server-to-electron && cd electron-app && npm run make
scripts.publish: npm run copy-server-to-electron && cd electron-app && npm run publish

author: Nuclia
